subject: USPS is present in over 120 co
body: USPS is present in over 120 countries and territories across the globe, making it to be among the most international company in the world. With a workforce exceeding 140,000 employees, we provide solutions for an almost infinite number of logistics needs

subject: Re: USPS is present in over 120 co
body:
Indeed, USPS is a global entity with a significant presence in numerous countries. Its vast workforce and extensive network allow it to cater to a wide range of logistics needs, making it one of the most reliable and efficient postal services worldwide. Whether it's domestic or international shipping, USPS has solutions for all.

Best wishes,
Kevin
